description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster or Node CPU / Memory / Network/ Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers statistics. Uses cAdvisor and kube-state metrics only.

targets.expr: sum (container_fs_usage_bytes{cluster=~"$Cluster",device=~"^/dev/.*$",id="/",kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}) by (kubernetes_io_hostname, device) / sum (container_fs_limit_bytes{cluster=~"$Cluster",device=~"^/dev/.*$",id="/",kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}) by (kubernetes_io_hostname, device) * 100

title: Kubernetes Monitor
